events.message: I received the wrong size shirt and I would like to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been categorized under Refund due to mention of return and refund request.
The case was assigned to support agent Jane Smith for resolution of the refund request.
Hello! I’m Jane from customer support. I’m here to help you with your return and refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the shirt you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 1234567890. I’ve attached a photo showing the shirt I got, which is a size L instead of M.
Thank you for the details. We will send you a prepaid return label and process your refund once we receive the incorrect item.
Thanks for your help! I appreciate the quick response and will send the shirt back as soon as I get the label.
We have received the returned shirt and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case as your refund has been completed successfully. Thank you for contacting customer support.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey about your support experience to help us improve our services.
